choiceresponse.div: Which of the following are good practices for creating a strong password?

choice.div: Use a combination of uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
Use your birthdate so it’s easier to remember
Avoid using common words or phrases like "password" or "123456"
Use the same password across all websites so you don’t forget it

div.p: Creating a strong password involves making it difficult to guess or crack. Good practices include using a mix of characters, avoiding common words, and keeping it long and unique.
